definition: courseware (abbr. for 課程軟件|课程软件[ke4 cheng2 ruan3 jian4])
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Motor learning courseware, a total of 7 chapters.
The Network Multimedia CAI Courseware provides a bran - new teaching mode.
sentences.chinese: 网络多媒体CAI课件提供了一种全新的教学模式。

sentences.english: The end-of-life then needs to be planned and performed.
sentences.chinese: 然后计划并执行课件生存期的结束。

sentences.english: This paper presented the methods of developing the multimedia courseware on architectural graphics.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了多媒体课件《建筑图学》的开发方法。

sentences.english: Give your loved one the gift of visibility.
sentences.chinese: 给你爱的人一份课件的礼物吧。

sentences.english: Therefore we're not going to distribute notes.
sentences.chinese: 因此我们不会散发课件。

sentences.english: Most of micro video courseware to record the screen or the form of classroom teaching activity.
sentences.chinese: 微视频大多以课件录屏或课堂教学实录的方式呈现。

sentences.english: I have to prepare five courseware every week.
sentences.chinese: 每星期我必须要准备五个课件。

sentences.english: But there appears the phenomenon of excessive dependence on electronic teaching plan and electronic courseware.
sentences.chinese: 但也出现了过分依赖电子教案和电子课件的现象。

sentences.english: The article expatiated on the making process of the multimedia courseware for medical function experiments.
sentences.chinese: 详细介绍了医学机能学实验多媒体课件的制作流程。

sentences.english: The concrete ope ration is divided into two stages:preparation for teaching and classroom teaching.
sentences.chinese: 具体操作分为课件准备和课堂教学两个阶段。

sentences.english: The courseware should be fully and easily accessible to student or instructor population.
sentences.chinese: 课件对学生和教师群体应是方便完全的可获得的。

sentences.english: Most of them are concerning about high school biology.
sentences.chinese: 我下载的大多数都是跟高中生物有关的课件。

sentences.english: I think the last thing I want to say is, we will not be handing out class notes.
sentences.chinese: 我认为我想说的最后一点事，我们不会发课件。

sentences.english: We build courseware using the spirit of RUP.
sentences.chinese: 我们用RUP的思想来构建课件。

sentences.english: Work with production team if necessary to deploy the courseware.
sentences.chinese: 如果必要的话与产品团队合作部署课件。

definition: lesson plan/teaching plan/a "missionary case" (a dispute over Christian missionaries during the late Qing)
problem or question solved for illustrative purposes in the classroom/practice question (used in preparation for an exam)/sample question
to attend a class/to go to a lecture
to write on the blackboard/writing on the blackboard
question bank (for examiners creating an exam, or students preparing for an exam)
